ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:0.5_0: The training rule on lying down on the same sheet
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.2_0: two nuns were lying down on the same sheet and under the same cover.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.3_0: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.4_0: “How can two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.14.1_0: ‘If two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover, they commit an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.1.4_0: fully ordained is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.1.5_0: If two lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.1.6_0: if they spread out just the one and cover themselves with just the one, they commit an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.1_0: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, and they perceive them as such, and they lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.2_0: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, but they are unsure of it, and they lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.3_0: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, but they perceive them as different, and they lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.4_0: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, but they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.5_0: If it is different sheets but the same cover, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.6_0: If it is different sheets and different covers, but they perceive them as the same, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.7_0: If it is different sheets and different covers, but they are unsure of it, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.8_0: If it is different sheets and different covers, and they perceive them as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.3.2_0: if they make a partition and then lie down;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.3.5_0: The second rule, the second training rule on fire, is finished.
